name: Athletics Championship
description:
Compete on all of the real stages in one of the greatest athletics game in the world. Manage your athlete, your team and lead them to victory!

Join the competition in 20 athletics disciplines such as 100m, shot put, long jump and more. Customize your athlete, pick the best equipment and Trainers in order to achieve victory! Build up your own Training centre, participate in Tournaments and connect with other players in Clubs.

Competing for gold has never been this much fun!

A network connection is required.

FEATURES:
● Duel players from around the world in athletics competitions and take their Trophies
● Earn chests to unlock rewards, collect powerful new cards with equipment and upgrade existing ones
● Progress through multiple Arenas all the way to the top
● Form a team to build your very own community
● Complete daily tasks for great rewards
● 20 Athletics disciplines: 100m, 200m, 400m, 800m, 1500m, 5000m, 10000m, Marathon, 110m hurdles, 400m hurdles, 3000m steeplechase, Long jump, Triple jump, High jump, Pole Vault, Shot put, Discus, Hammer, Javelin, Decathlon
